name: The Fiscapist
description:
*Knock knock* It's the Tax Administration ! You have only 60 seconds to pack all your ill-gotten possessions and leave town before they take everything. But beware : the more stuff you load on your truck the more it'll be hard to maneuver... and the more fiercely the police will chase you ! 

CONTROLS :

  • Move with ZQSD / WASD
  • Steer camera with mouse (left -right)
  • Left click to interact

CREDITS :

Made for the 48 hour 2022 UT GameGuild Jam.

Godot Engine

Graphics :

  • ColorMan777
  • Failord
  • Léo
